meaningMnemonic: Press <kanji>uneven</kanji> carvings into paper to make the newest <kanji>edition</kanji> of your magazine. What you're using is a <vocabulary>letterpress</vocabulary>. This made mass printing nice and cheap(ish) in Japan!
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own. Watch out because はん becomes ぱん here.
